name: REAL AEROCLUB DE NAVARRA
about: The Real Aeroclub de Navarra is a renowned flying school and club based at Pamplona Airport (LEPP) in Spain. With a rich history in aviation, the club has been training hundreds of pilots for many years. Approved by AESA as an ATO (Approved Training Organisation), the Aeroclub meets all required standards and boasts instructors with extensive and proven experience. The school offers comprehensive training programs, including the private piloting licence (PPL/A) and other aviation courses, catering to both aspiring professional pilots and those flying for pleasure. Operating daily from 08:00 AM to 06:00 PM, the Aeroclub provides a fleet of airplanes, state-of-the-art facilities, and a supportive environment to help students achieve their aviation goals. Whether you aim to make aviation your career or simply enjoy flying, the Real Aeroclub de Navarra is dedicated to helping you fulfill your dreams.
services:
["Introductory course
Private pilot course PPL(A)
Touring Motor Glider
Night flight qualification"]
